statements: SELECT * FROM child_education_records WHERE age > 10;
SELECT child_id, child_name, grade_level FROM child_education_records WHERE grade_level = '5th Grade';
SELECT teacher_name, school_name FROM child_education_records WHERE school_name = 'ABC School';
SELECT child_name, age FROM child_education_records WHERE age < 8 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, grade_level FROM child_education_records WHERE grade_level IN ('Kindergarten', '1st Grade') ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM child_education_records WHERE age > 10 ORDER BY child_name DESC, school_name ASC
SELECT child_name, grade_level FROM child_education_records WHERE school_name = 'ABC School' ORDER BY grade_level ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM child_education_records WHERE grade_level = 'High School'
SELECT * FROM child_education_records WHERE age BETWEEN 8 AND 12 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT teacher_name, COUNT(*) as total_children FROM child_education_records GROUP BY teacher_name HAVING total_children > 2
SELECT * FROM child_education_records WHERE grade_level = '5th Grade';
SELECT school_id, student_id, academic_year FROM school_performance_data WHERE gpa > 3.5 ORDER BY academic_year DESC;
SELECT parent_id, subjects FROM child_education_records WHERE child_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM school_performance_data WHERE behavior_score < 70;
SELECT student_id, gpa FROM school_performance_data WHERE academic_year = '2021-2022' ORDER BY gpa DESC;
SELECT * FROM child_education_records WHERE grade_level='4th Grade';
SELECT child_id, parent_id, subjects FROM child_education_records ORDER BY child_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, academic_year, gpa, behavior_score FROM school_performance_data WHERE academic_year='2021-2022' AND gpa >= 3.5;
SELECT child_id, parent_id, grade_level, subjects FROM child_education_records WHERE grade_level IN ('Kindergarten', '1st Grade');
SELECT * FROM school_performance_data ORDER BY behavior_score DESC, gpa ASC;
SELECT * FROM Child_Education_Records;
SELECT name, age, grade_level FROM Child_Education_Records WHERE age > 10;
SELECT school_name, city, state FROM School_Performance_Data WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT evaluator_name, evaluation_date FROM Custody_Evaluations WHERE evaluation_result = 'Positive';
SELECT child_id, name, grade_level, school_id FROM Child_Education_Records WHERE grade_level = 'High School';
SELECT child_id, name, age, grade_level, school_id FROM Child_Education_Records WHERE age >= 10 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT school_name, city, state, district FROM School_Performance_Data WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY school_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT child_id, evaluator_name, evaluation_date, evaluation_result FROM Custody_Evaluations WHERE evaluation_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Child_Education_Records JOIN Custody_Evaluations ON Child_Education_Records.child_id = Custody_Evaluations.child_id ORDER BY Child_Education_Records.child_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ce.child_id, ce.name, ce.grade_level, ce.school_id, sp.school_name, sp.city, sp.state, sp.district FROM Child_Education_Records ce JOIN School_Performance_Data sp ON ce.school_id = sp.school_id ORDER BY ce.grade_level ASC, sp.school_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM child_education_records;
SELECT child_name, age FROM child_education_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT guardian_name, child_name, age, grade_level FROM child_education_records WHERE age > 10;
SELECT * FROM school_performance_data WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT district_name, contact_person FROM school_districts;
SELECT child_name, age, grade_level, guardian_name FROM child_education_records;
SELECT school_name, performance_score, teacher_name FROM school_performance_data WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluator_name, evaluation_date, custody_decision FROM custody_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT district_name, district_location, contact_email FROM school_districts WHERE district_location = 'New York';
SELECT child_name, age, grade_level, guardian_name FROM child_education_records WHERE age >= 10;
SELECT * FROM Custody_Evaluation;
SELECT child_name, grade_level, school_name FROM Child_Education WHERE grade_level='5th';
SELECT school_name, average_grade, graduation_rate FROM School_Performance WHERE total_enrollment > 500;
SELECT parent_name, address, email FROM Parent_Info WHERE occupation='Lawyer' OR occupation='Doctor';

SELECT Custody_Decision.decision_id, Custody_Decision.custody_awarded_to, Custody_Evaluation.evaluator_name FROM Custody_Decision INNER JOIN Custody_Evaluation ON Custody_Decision.evaluation_id = Custody_Evaluation.evaluation_id;
SELECT child_id, child_name, grade_level, school_name, teacher_name FROM Child_Education;
SELECT school_name, average_grade, school_district, total_enrollment, graduation_rate FROM School_Performance WHERE graduation_rate > 90;
SELECT evaluation_id, child_id, evaluator_name, evaluation_date, evaluation_notes FROM Custody_Evaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT parent_name, address, phone_number, email, occupation FROM Parent_Info WHERE occupation = 'Lawyer';
SELECT decision_id, evaluation_id, parent_id, custody_awarded_to, visitation_schedule, decision_date FROM Custody_Decision WHERE custody_awarded_to = 'Mother';
